paper_metadata.title: Education as one of the fundamental factors of poverty reduction according to multi-dimensional poverty line in Vietnam

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Multi-dimensional poverty in Vietnam in the period of 2016-2020 calculated by Alkire-Foster method consists of 5 dimensions (education, health, housing, living conditions, access to information)
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This article takes the method of dialectical materialism and historical materialism of Marxism-Leninism as the theoretical basis

evidence_citations.country_citation: Vietnam's achievements in poverty reduction are one of the most successful stories in social economic development
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: poor and near-poor households according to multi-dimensional poverty line for the stage of 2016-2020 in Vietnam
